summary: This is a brief email forwarding a New York Times article link about the arrest of two prison guards in connection with Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email indicates the guards are in custody.

events.title: Arrest of Epstein Prison Guards Reported
events.description: The New York Times reports that two prison guards have been taken into custody in connection with the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a New York Times article link dated November 19, 2019.
The article reports that two prison guards are in custody in connection with Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The email's subject and content confirm the guards' arrest was a current news event at the time.
